vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.2.18; his mother was Zeruiah (H6870);
brother of: Abishai (H0052) and Joab (H3097);
father of: Zebadiah (H2069K)
§ Asahel = "God-made"
1) nephew of David, son of David's sister Zeruiah, and brother of Joab and Abishai; swift of foot he was killed by Abner when he pursued him in battle and caught him
2) a Levite in the reign of king Jehoshaphat of Judah who went through the kingdom giving instruction in the law
3) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes and dedicated things in the temple
4) a priest, father of Jonathan, in the time of Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Seruiá, hermana de David; guerrero; (b)   levita; en tiempos del rey Josafat; (c)   funcionario; en tiempos del rey Ezequías; (d)   padre de Jonatán; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞撒黑 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "神所造的"
1) 大衛王的外甥, 大衛的姐妹洗魯雅的兒子, 約押, 亞比篩的兄弟; 他以跑得快著稱,
他在一場爭鬥中追逐押尼珥時, 被押尼珥刺死 (撒下 2:18-32)
2) 猶大王約沙法時的一位利未人, 他走遍猶大王國給予人民律法書的指導
(代下 17:8)
3) 猶大王希西家時的一位利未人, 是負責徵收十一稅及在聖殿敬獻的人之一
(代下 31:13)
4) 以斯拉時一位祭司約拿單的父親 (拉 10:15)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚撒黑 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "神所造的"
1) 大卫王的外甥, 大卫的姐妹洗鲁雅的儿子, 约押, 亚比筛的兄弟; 他以跑得快著称,
他在一场争斗中追逐押尼珥时, 被押尼珥刺死 (撒下 2:18-32)
2) 犹大王约沙法时的一位利未人, 他走遍犹大王国给予人民律法书的指导
(代下 17:8)
3) 犹大王希西家时的一位利未人, 是负责征收十一税及在圣殿敬献的人之一
(代下 31:13)
4) 以斯拉时一位祭司约拿单的父亲 (拉 10:15)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.17.8
§ Asahel = "God-made"
1) nephew of David, son of David's sister Zeruiah, and brother of Joab and Abishai; swift of foot he was killed by Abner when he pursued him in battle and caught him
2) a Levite in the reign of king Jehoshaphat of Judah who went through the kingdom giving instruction in the law
3) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes and dedicated things in the temple
4) a priest, father of Jonathan, in the time of Ezra

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Ezr.10.15;
father of: Jonathan (H3129I)
§ Asahel = "God-made"
1) nephew of David, son of David's sister Zeruiah, and brother of Joab and Abishai; swift of foot he was killed by Abner when he pursued him in battle and caught him
2) a Levite in the reign of king Jehoshaphat of Judah who went through the kingdom giving instruction in the law
3) a Levite in the reign of king Hezekiah of Judah in charge of the tithes and dedicated things in the temple
4) a priest, father of Jonathan, in the time of Ezra
